solution_line_template: Jack and Rose handed a total of {jack_flyers_handed} + {rose_flyers_handed} = <<{jack_flyers_handed}+{rose_flyers_handed}={total_handed}>>{total_handed} flyers.
So, they still have {total_flyers_initial} - {total_handed} = <<{total_flyers_initial}-{total_handed}={flyers_left}>>{flyers_left} flyers left to be handed out around.
